|chip1 = Cisco;08-0458-01;Cisco Systems, (c) 08-0458-01, AT56264, 0J2426, 0144 KOREA; |chip2 = Intersil;HFA3863; |chip3 = Intersil;; |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = MMCX |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/27/2000 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 746320557168 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |asin = B00006HSS2 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China, Singapore

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device is part of the '''Cisco Aironet 350 Series'''. :[http://www.cisco.com/en/US/prod/collateral/wireless/ps6442/ps4555/ps448/product_data_sheet09186a0080088828.html '''Aironet 350 Series''' product page]
This card has an additional P/N of '''47-11496-01''' / '''800-12245-06'''.
Additional specifcations, per the '''Cisco''' product page, follow...
{{802dot11 RxSens|11b |1M=-94 |2M=-91 |5.5M=-89 |11M=-85 }}
